content: Cinovation Scriptware is an old screenplay writing program that was available for Windows version 3 and old Mac PCs. Scriptware is no longer actively developed, so it cannot be installed in modern versions of Windows or macOS.

Provided you can open your SW3 files in Cinovation Scriptware, you can convert the files into ASCII text documents or Final Draft documents. To do so, select File → Export as... from Scriptware's menu bar, and then select either the ASCII or Tabbed (Final Draft) formats. You can open ASCII text documents in Microsoft Word and other word processing programs.

description: An SW3 file is a screenplay created using Cinovation Scriptware, a scriptwriting software previously available for Windows and Mac PCs. It contains text formatted using Scriptware's screenplay and scriptwriting tools. SW3 files can be opened only in Cinovation Scriptware.

instructions: You can open SW3 files (Scriptware Screenplays) in Cinovation Scriptware (Windows, Mac). No other programs can open SW3 files. Scriptware is not compatible with newer versions of Windows and macOS, so you may have difficulty opening your SW3 files.

Provided you can open your SW3 files in Cinovation Scriptware, you can convert the files into ASCII text documents or Final Draft documents. To do so, select File → Export as... from Scriptware's menu bar, and then select either the ASCII or Tabbed (Final Draft) formats. You can open ASCII text documents in Microsoft Word and other word processing programs.
